title:
Gorenstein Fano threefolds of Picard number one with a
  $\mathbb{K}^*$-action and maximal orbit quotient $\mathbb{P}_2$
abstract:
We classify the non-toric, $\mathbb{Q}$-factorial, Gorenstein, Fano
threefolds of Picard number one with an effective $\mathbb{K}^*$-action and
maximal orbit quotient $\mathbb{P}_2$.
